articles.title: World premiere of the ID. 2all (ID. 2all – the vehicle is a concept car and is not available for sale.) concept: the electric car from Volkswagen costing less than 25000 euros - Volkswagen Newsroom
articles.description: The Volkswagen brand is continuing the success story of its compact cars in the age of electric mobility and is providing a first glimpse of an all-electric Volkswagen costing less than 25,000 euros with the ID. 2all concept car. Initial facts: front-wheel dr…
